results.title: [Effects of simvastatin on pulmonary nuclear factor-kappaB and intercellular adhesion molecule-1 in rats with lung injury induced by ischemia-reperfusion of the hind limbs].
results.journal: Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@Alveolar edema@@@, localized @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Atelectasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001261 @@@pulmonary atelectasis@@@ and large amount of PMN infiltration were found in @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@ group, and these changes were ameliorated in the 3 @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ groups (S(1), S(5), @CHEMICAL_S_10 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C012009 @@@S(10)@@@).

citations.NLM: Sun XF, Wang JK, Yang J, Zhao H. [Effects of simvastatin on pulmonary nuclear factor-kappaB and intercellular adhesion molecule-1 in rats with lung injury induced by ischemia-reperfusion of the hind limbs]. Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao. 2011 Jun;31(7):1150-3. PMID: 21764683
